scripts.build: npm run build-popup & npm run build-popover & npm run build-poppy
scripts.build-poppy: npm run minify-poppy && browserify -x mod-constructor -r placer -r ./index.js:poppy > dist/poppy.js
scripts.build-popup: npm run minify-popup && browserify -x mod-constructor -x placer -x poppy src/popup.js > dist/popup.js
scripts.build-popover: npm run minify-popover && browserify -x mod-constructor -x placer -x poppy src/popover.js > dist/popover.js
